snippet: The Appellate Division of the New York State Supreme Court unanimously voted on Tuesday to allow for a major expansion in the heart of Greenwich Village.
abstract: New York State’s Court of Appeals unanimously votes to allow New York University's plan for major expansion in the heart of Greenwich Village.
lead_paragraph: The Appellate Division of the New York State Supreme Court unanimously voted on Tuesday to allow for a major expansion in the heart of Greenwich Village.

headline.main: Court Gives Go-Ahead to Expansion by N.Y.U.
headline.print_headline: Court Allows N.Y.U.’s Plan for Expansion in the Village

keywords.value: Greenwich Village Society for Historic Preservation
keywords.name: organizations
